title: Hero MotoCorp reports 4,86,704 wholesales in May
description: The volumes in the month of May indicate the continuously improving consumer sentiment and the company expects the positive trend to continue in the coming months on the back of normal monsoon, decent Rabi harvest and continued government policy support, Hero MotoCorp noted.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
